
# Summary

>Merge `branch X` into `branch Y`
>

*Example:* Merge branch `96-create-github-folder-for-issue-templates-and-pull-request-templates`into `dev`

## Body

>Describe what has been done in this branch
>

*Example:* Add templates for issues and pull requests

## Footer

>What issue number does this pull request close
>

*Example:* Closes #96

## Pull request reference

>See `Pull request #`

*Example:* See pull request #98
